mapper.select: SELECT p.PRO_NICKNAME, pc.* FROM PRO p JOIN PRO_COMMENT pc ON p.PRO_NUMBER = pc.PRO_NUMBER AND PRO_POST_NUMBER = #{proPostNumber} ORDER BY PRO_COMMENT_UPDATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRO_COMMENT(PRO_COMMENT_NUMBER, PRO_COMMENT_CONTENT, PRO_COMMENT_REGISTER_DATE, PRO_COMMENT_UPDATE_DATE, PRO_POST_NUMBER, PRO_NUMBER) VALUES (SEQ_PROJECT.nextval, #{proCommentContent}, sysdate, sysdate, #{proPostNumber}, #{proNumber})
